landing.title: 3D Printing On Demand in Poland
landing.subtitle: Upload your 3D model, get an instant quote, and receive professional prints at your doorstep
landing.step1Desc: Support for STL, OBJ, and STEP files
landing.step2Desc: Choose material, color, quality, and more
landing.feature1Desc: Most orders completed within 3-5 business days
landing.feature2Desc: Professional-quality prints with attention to detail
landing.contactSubtitle: Have a question or ready to start a project? We'd love to hear from you
landing.footerCopyright: © 2024 ProtoLab. All rights reserved. Made with ❤️ in Poland

aboutUs.title: Shaping the Future of 3D Printing
aboutUs.subtitle: We are a team of 3D technology enthusiasts dedicated to delivering the highest quality prints in Poland
aboutUs.storyPara1: ProtoLab was founded in 2020 out of a passion for innovation and 3D printing technology. From the beginning, our goal has been to deliver the highest quality prints for individual and business customers.
aboutUs.storyPara2: Over the years, we have expanded our operations, investing in state-of-the-art equipment and refining our processes to ensure excellent results with every order.
aboutUs.storyPara3: Today, we serve hundreds of customers monthly, offering fast turnaround times and competitive prices without compromising on quality.
aboutUs.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide our work every day
aboutUs.value1Desc: We care about every detail to make your projects look exactly as you imagined
aboutUs.value2Desc: We love what we do and this passion translates into the quality of our work
aboutUs.value3Desc: We constantly invest in new technologies to offer the best solutions
aboutUs.value4Desc: We keep our promises and deadlines that you can count on
aboutUs.milestone1Desc: Starting the first 3D printer and first orders
aboutUs.milestone2Desc: Adding new materials and printing techniques
aboutUs.milestone3Desc: Moving to a larger facility with modern equipment
aboutUs.teamDesc1: Mechanical engineer with a passion for 3D printing and innovation
aboutUs.teamDesc2: Expert in process optimization and quality control
aboutUs.teamDesc3: Always ready to help and advise on choosing the best solution

story.title: Our Story

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Making 3D printing technology accessible to everyone by offering professional services at affordable prices.

registration.subject: Welcome to ProtoLab 3D Poland! 🎉
registration.title: 🎉 Welcome to ProtoLab 3D Poland!
registration.thankYou: Thank you for registering with us. We're excited to have you join our community of 3D printing enthusiasts!
registration.verifyEmail: Check your email for a verification link to complete your registration.

verification.subject: Verify Your Email Address - ProtoLab 3D Poland
verification.title: ✅ Verify Your Email
verification.thankYou: Thank you for signing up with ProtoLab 3D Poland. To complete your registration, please verify your email address by clicking the button below:
verification.orCopyLink: Or copy and paste this link into your browser:
verification.expiresIn: ⏰ This verification link will expire in 24 hours.
verification.afterVerification: Once verified, you'll be automatically logged in to your account and can start uploading your 3D models.
verification.ignore: If you didn't create this account, please ignore this email.

welcome.subject: Congratulations! Your Account is Ready 🚀
welcome.title: 🎉 Congratulations!
welcome.verified: ✅ Your email has been verified successfully!
welcome.accountActive: Your account is now active and ready to use.
welcome.feature3: ⚙️ Configure print settings (layer height, infill, etc.)
welcome.feature4: 📦 Place orders and track them in real-time
welcome.thankYou: Thank you for choosing ProtoLab 3D Poland. We're here to bring your ideas to life! 🚀

passwordReset.subject: Reset Your Password - ProtoLab 3D Poland
passwordReset.title: 🔐 Password Reset Request
passwordReset.received: We received a request to reset your password for your ProtoLab 3D Poland account.
passwordReset.expiresIn: This link will expire in 1 hour
passwordReset.ignore: If you didn't request this, please ignore this email
passwordReset.unchanged: Your password will remain unchanged until you create a new one
passwordReset.linkNotWorking: If the button doesn't work, copy and paste this link into your browser:

paymentConfirmation.subject: Payment Confirmation - Order #{{orderNumber}}
paymentConfirmation.title: ✅ Payment Confirmed
paymentConfirmation.confirmed: Your payment for order #{{orderNumber}} has been successfully processed.
paymentConfirmation.step1: Your order is now in the print queue
paymentConfirmation.step2: You'll receive email updates on progress
paymentConfirmation.step3: You'll be notified when your order ships

refund.subject: Refund Request - Order #{{orderNumber}}
refund.title: 💰 Refund Request Received
refund.received: We've received your refund request for order #{{orderNumber}}.
refund.step1: Our team will review your request within 1-2 business days
refund.step2: You'll receive an email with the decision
refund.step3: If approved, the refund will be processed within 3-5 business days

invoice.subject: Invoice for Order #{{orderNumber}} - ProtoLab 3D Poland
invoice.title: 📄 Your Invoice
invoice.attached: Please find attached the invoice for your order.
invoice.download: You can also download the invoice from your account dashboard.

conversations.subtitle: Communicate with our engineering team about your print jobs
